text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d0337e360e9f0b51a1a5627239d80a45dee8c3be|patch 8.2.0060: message test only runs with one encoding>
patch 8.2.0060: message test only runs with one encoding

Problem:    Message test only runs with one encoding. (Dominique Pelle)
Solution:   Run the test with "utf-8" and "latin1".  Fix underflow. (related
            to #5410)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0060: message test only runs with one encoding · vim/vim@d0337e3
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0060: message test only runs with one encoding · vim/vim@d0337e3
attachments.text: Problem: Message test only runs with one encoding. (Dominique Pelle) Solution: Run the test with "utf-8" and "latin1". Fix underflow. (related to #5410)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3fbcc128cbd2311819cc5a7bb89e45669860f008|patch 8.2.0061: the execute stack can grow big and never shrinks>
patch 8.2.0061: the execute stack can grow big and never shrinks

Problem:    The execute stack can grow big and never shrinks.
Solution:   Reduce the size in gargage collect.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0061: the execute stack can grow big and never shrinks · vim/vim@3fbcc12
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0061: the execute stack can grow big and never shrinks · vim/vim@3fbcc12
attachments.text: Problem: The execute stack can grow big and never shrinks. Solution: Reduce the size in gargage collect.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e7538ae997b3983d0c91a886a74ebacedd752164|patch 8.2.0062: memory test is flaky on FreeBSD>
patch 8.2.0062: memory test is flaky on FreeBSD

Problem:    Memory test is flaky on FreeBSD.
Solution:   Add a short sleep before getting the first size.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0062: memory test is flaky on FreeBSD · vim/vim@e7538ae
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0062: memory test is flaky on FreeBSD · vim/vim@e7538ae
attachments.text: Problem: Memory test is flaky on FreeBSD. Solution: Add a short sleep before getting the first size.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/08b28b7ad52d5ee3cb5fa5982b647e325a410484|patch 8.2.0063: wrong size argument to vim_snprintf()>
patch 8.2.0063: wrong size argument to vim_snprintf()

Problem:    Wrong size argument to vim_snprintf(). (Dominique Pelle)
Solution:   Reduce the size by the length. (related to #5410)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0063: wrong size argument to vim_snprintf() · vim/vim@08b28b7
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0063: wrong size argument to vim_snprintf() · vim/vim@08b28b7
attachments.text: Problem: Wrong size argument to vim_snprintf(). (Dominique Pelle) Solution: Reduce the size by the length. (related to #5410)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/efcc329020ef089267f5f3994b8544eb58806311|patch 8.2.0064: diffmode completion doesn't use per-window setting>
patch 8.2.0064: diffmode completion doesn't use per-window setting

Problem:    Diffmode completion doesn't use per-window setting.
Solution:   Check if a window is in diff mode. (Dominique Pell, closes #5419)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0064: diffmode completion doesn't use per-window setting · vim/vim@efcc329
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0064: diffmode completion doesn't use per-window setting · vim/vim@efcc329
attachments.text: Problem: Diffmode completion doesn't use per-window setting. Solution: Check if a window is in diff mode. (Dominique Pell, closes #5419)

patch 8.2.0065: Amiga and alikes: autoopen only used on Amiga OS4

Solution:   Adjust #ifdefs. (Ola Söder, closes #5413)
